summary: This is a forwarded email from Katharine Parker containing an unsealing order related to the Epstein case. The email includes attachments of the government's unsealing request and proposed order, indicating legal proceedings to make documents public.

persons.name: Katharine Parker
persons.context: Sent an email forwarding the unsealing order and related documents to recipients, likely involved in the legal proceedings.

events.title: Unsealing order forwarded
events.description: Katharine Parker forwards the government's unsealing request and proposed order via email, indicating ongoing legal efforts to release documents.

keyFacts: An unsealing order related to the Epstein case was forwarded via email on July 2, 2020.
The email attachments include the government's unsealing request and a proposed order.
The correspondence suggests active legal proceedings to make case documents public.
